snippet: The renowned 98-year-old architect told the police that his aide, Eter Nikolaishvili, 28, grabbed his right forearm and forcefully twisted it on Dec. 13.
abstract: Police say Eter Nikolaishvili, home health aide to renowned architect I M Pei, has been charged with assaulting him inside his Manhattan home; Pei had reported that Nikolaishvili grabbed his right forearm and forcefully twisted it.
lead_paragraph: The renowned 98-year-old architect told the police that his aide, Eter Nikolaishvili, 28, grabbed his right forearm and forcefully twisted it on Dec. 13.

headline.main: Aide Charged in Assault on I. M. Pei
headline.print_headline: Aide Charged in Assault on Renowned Architect
